      public String positionInfo(Positions position)
      Given a position, returns as a String the name of the character on it
      Parameters:
      position - The position where I'll get the info
      Returns:
      A string with the name of the character on it, if there's one

    • positionDetails

      public String positionDetails(Positions position)
      Given a position, returns as a String the info of the character on it
      Parameters:
      position - The position where I'll get the info
      Returns:
      A string with the info of the character on it, if there's one

    • setCharacter

      public void setCharacter(Character c, Positions pos) throws InvalidPositionException
      Given a character and a position, puts the character on the battleground if the position is empty
      Parameters:
      c - The character that I want to place on the battelground
      pos - The position on which I want to place the character
      Throws:
      InvalidPositionException - When the position I give is already occupied

    • cloneMap

      public com.google.common.collect.BiMap<Positions,Character> cloneMap()
      Clones the battleground, used for the undo function
      Returns:
      A new BiMap which is exactly the clone of the battleground at that exact time
